channel.title: Virus Help Please I Got A Crazy Virus :(
channel.description:
Hello I was doing a projet for english and I downloaded a book to help me on the topic and it was actually a TrojanDownload, It has disabled my task manager and I have pop ups like every minute saying my computer is infected with spyware to buy these Anti-Virus programs. It has also changes my desktop background to a light blue that says "your computer is infected click here to fix it.
Any help would be great thanks I did a whole bunch of virus scans with AVG and McAfee but the virus keeps comming back.

item.title: Virus Help Please I Got A Crazy Virus :(
item.dc:creator: @jme jme
item.description:
@jme wrote:

Don’t make several threads. It’s spam.

Read full topic
